item.description:
The Plymouth Wishbone Walking Trail was set up in 2007 by a local scout and runs from Myles Standish headquarters all the way to Ellisville Harbor State Park on Cape Cod Bay in Plymouth.


It is reported to be 15 miles in length. Here is a link to all the info I have about the Plymouth Wishbone Walking Trail

About 2/3 of the trail is in the State Forest or in other conservation property, with the remainder on local dirt roads and ending on the beach at Ellisville. The planned Plymouth Wishbone Walking Trail route is visible online at Mapmyrun.com. (A rough approximation-- it looks like it might be shorter than 15 miles-- possibly only 12 miles.)

We will meet at Ellisville Harbor State Park and will need to carpool to Myles Standish State Forest headquarters (or be prepared for a 30 mile walk.)

This is a very long walk. People always want to know how long-- I would estimate seven hours in total including regular breaks and a stop for lunch. You need to wear good shoes, bring your lunch and lots of water. Sunscreen and tick protection are also recommended.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Let's hike the Wishbone Trail
